fullName: Get File Metadata: User will get error while getting file metadata if filepath is invalid

name: User will get error while getting file metadata if filepath is invalid

steps.name: Given  I want to get metadata of file by invalid path "//first.png"
When  I send POST request to "https://api.dropboxapi.com/2/sharing/get_file_metadata"
Then  I will get response with status code "409 Conflict", which contains "Error"
